title: Constant dc issues since new patch dropped
body: Ever since patch 6.18 I've been experiencing frequent disconnects while I'm in game. I'll have a steady 50 ping, and I lose control of my character for like 15 seconds. I've never had connection issues until the new patch help.

replies.body: I don't know how but it's fixed for me.

I have the same issue. I tried deleting everything I have from league of Legends and download league again on my pc, did not help fixing it. Tried to disable iphelper (read on older post that this could solve the problem) did not work either. So im clueless what to do now..

The other problem I face is that in champ select I cant lock in, just before my turn to lock in the enemy's countdown is stuck at 0 because I got dc'ed and then after a 1-2 minuts I ''dodged'' the game and lose the LP.

I don't believe this is a result of the recent patch, but a coincidence.  It seems that you may be having input delays caused by network issues like packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these matches for an overview of what's going on.  You'll also find a list of troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!
